summary.para: The KERB_PURGE_TKT_CACHE_REQUEST structure contains information used to delete entries from the ticket cache.

member.name: KERB_PURGE_TKT_CACHE_REQUEST.MessageType
member.summary: value identifying the type of request being made. This member must be set to KerbPurgeTicketCacheMessage.

member.name: KERB_PURGE_TKT_CACHE_REQUEST.LogonId
member.summary: structure containing the logon session identifier. This can be zero for the current user's logon session. If not zero, the caller must have the SeTcbPrivilege privilege set. If this fails, the Kerberos authentication package sets the ProtocolStatus parameter of to STATUS_ACCESS_DENIED.

member.name: KERB_PURGE_TKT_CACHE_REQUEST.ServerName
member.summary: containing the name of the service whose tickets should be deleted from the cache.

member.name: KERB_PURGE_TKT_CACHE_REQUEST.RealmName
member.summary: containing the name of the realm whose tickets should be deleted from the cache.
